title: Pair of Eyeballs
summaries: The Pair of Eyeballs is a Hardmode pet-summoning item that spawns Rez and Spaz, miniature versions of The Twins in their first form. The Pair of Eyeballs has a 1/4 (25%) chance of being dropped by The Twins in Master Mode.

statistics.Tooltip:
Summons miniature mechanical eyes
'Two are better than one.'
statistics.Sell: 5 GC
